hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q '\.php$'; then if [ -f vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer ]; then vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" --quiet 2>/dev/null; elif [ -f vendor/bin/pint ]; then vendor/bin/pint "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" --quiet 2>/dev/null; fi; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q '\.php$'; then if [ -f vendor/bin/phpstan ]; then vendor/bin/phpstan analyse "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" --no-progress --error-format=raw 2>/dev/null; fi; fi
